A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a disappointment- the longer the movie went on the more upset I was getting from the so called “twists” that were shocking in a negative let down way as well as the unnecessary; out of place comedy - to the wasted 15 mins of a side mission with Finn. I felt the movie was adding to something that never reached a climax at least not from a fans perspective- I’m very disappointed in this film I left the theater feeling upset and empty. Rouge one was a better movie and I wasn’t even a fan of that one so go figure- luke MASTER Skywalker deserved a better end than that - horrible storytelling and direction J.J. Abrams has a lot of cleaning up to do with the mess left behind by R. Johnson
